description: After the release of security update KB-120.0.2210.61 for Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) on December 7, 2023, users may experience complete failure of the browser to launch or function properly. Build number 120.0.2210.61 is essential for addressing the vulnerabilities identified by CVE-2023-6509, specifically a use-after-free issue affecting browser searches. Users failing to update may still encounter instability or errors when attempting to use the Edge browser after installation.
